lines.text: You know about the Navy's rules against fraternization among officers.
Well, I guess I'm retired again!
Did we wake you up?
No sir, we've been up since the crack of noon.
Stolen Vodka Surprise. We stole Vladikov's vodka. Surprise!
Just a warning, anyone or anything sleeping in the trees will be SHOT!
[going through contraband items]
McHale's Mai Tai... McHale's Ale... McHale's Girls of the San Ysidro Islands calendar? Will somebody explain to me what this is?
You see, sir, these are scantily-clad yet tasteful photos of women the men use as an...
Shut up!
[during bar brawl]
Well, it seems that my stuntmen have arrived. I'd better go... rehearse.
Cuba. The land of oppression. And opportunity.

[under attack by Vladimir]
This guy's a real prick!
Are you NUTS?

[to Vladikov]
... but I am here to help you, even if you're keeping my entire family hostage in Bangladesh.
What a dick!

[looking at Binghampton]
Hey Happy, ain't that the guy who sank the Love Boat?

[recognizes Binghampton]
Oh yeah!
Suck in that gut sailor!
I'm totally sucked!

[Has just been given bad news, picks up his pistol and shoots over shoulder at henchmen who delivered it]
Did I get him?

[Looks back to see Vladikov shot off the henchmans ear]
Just missed.
